ragtag.roy.name: Roy
ragtag.roy.description: A young farmer who had befriended the forest spirits and was granted power to imbue elemental magic into tools.

ragtag.lennie.name: Lennie
ragtag.lennie.description: A young orphan who was abandoned by the lake. Raised by the guardian of the lake, they have learned how to live with and take care the nature.
